tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE training_history (
    training_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    training_date DATE,
    training_time TIME,
    loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE model_training (
  training_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  training_date DATE,
  training_time TIME,
  training_duration INTERVAL,
  loss FLOAT,
  accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE evaluation_metrics (
  eval_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  training_id INT REFERENCES model_training(training_id),
  evaluation_date DATE,
  evaluation_time TIME,
  precision FLOAT,
  recall FLOAT,
  f1_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE model_performance_metrics (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    precision FLOAT,
    recall FLOAT,
    f1_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE training_parameters (
    training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    batch_size INT,
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    epochs INT
);

CREATE TABLE training_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR,
    training_date TIMESTAMP,
    loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    validation_date TIMESTAMP,
    precision FLOAT,
    recall FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE models (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR,
    architecture VARCHAR,
    hyperparameters JSON
)

CREATE TABLE datasets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name VARCHAR,
    source VARCHAR,
    size_mb INT
)

CREATE TABLE training_datasets (
    training_id INT,
    dataset_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE model_runs (
    run_id INT,
    model_id INT,
    training_id INT,
    validation_id INT,
    status VARCHAR
)
